str2: Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A prostitute; met: an idolatrous community. Feminine of pornos; a strumpet; figuratively, an idolater.
Rahab, a Canaanitess, who rescued the Hebrew spies at Jericho. Of Hebrew origin; Raab, a Canaanitess.

str2: To take, receive, accept, welcome. Middle voice of a primary verb; to receive.

A spy, scout. From kata and skopos; a reconnoiterer.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To perish along with. From sun and apollumi; to destroy in company with.

str2: To disobey, rebel, be disloyal, refuse conformity. From apeithes; to disbelieve.
